thread.section_title: Hotel Hor - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great first impression
thread.title_full: Great first impression - Review of Hotel Hor, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: kiwiscanfly30
title: Great first impression
text:
I arrived after a long flight to be greeted by a pleasant and enthusiastic young man called Jan. I was early ... like 08:30 but Jan said it would be absolutely no problem to get access to my room. I was very grateful - everything was easy.
Hotel is very close to Gare du Nord and about a 45 minute walk to Notre Dame if you feel inclined.
Comfortable, modern and clean rooms.
